"Oh silly little trick, it is so easy to get under your skin. Oh Tricky you are a riot.

First, All of the Spartans in 300 die.  

Second, You refer to the uploader as "jho" and do it regularly.

And finally, in response to your accusations of me playing the "race card" I will quote you your own words -  "I hope your ass hole gets bigger while getting f%^&ed by Tyrone and Carlos...BITCH"

The term "bitch", no matter who it is directed at can never escape its inherent misogyny. You betray yours in your assumptions that sistromo cannot defend herself, which is chauvinistic.  I, however, am treating her with equality. 

Keep counting little doggie, maybe your masters will give you a treat for your misguided loyalty.
Since you are one to pick at nits, I suppose I should say "All of the Spartans at the Battle of Thermopylae save Dilios, died"

"...in a cage with a putbull" Wonder what a 'putbull' is.

@booboo and BarrySoetoro: you ever notice that people who resort to foul language and breathing threats are not able to defend their positions logically so that is their only recourse (other than wanking to get rid of their frustration that no-one is taking them seriously?) LOL!!

I do want to state for the record that 'bitches' is the antiquated term for a female dog, and that having several wonderful canine members of my family would not be here if not for their mothers who gave them birth. So I am grateful.

I get my giggles from the trolls here who never fail to make my day so carry on: pretend you have something important to say; and we'll keep goading you because it so easy to get a rise out of you knowing you'll squawk on cue like the trained seals you are!

Carry on.... LOL!

When little trick says "bitch" he isn't referring to the original meaning.

His use, as is sadly common today, is disparaging of the masculinity of his target and inherently hostile to femininity in general.

Like many liberals, he harbors a bitter sexism and racial prejudice that he can only obscure by attacking others.
